name: HeapVR
description: HeapVR is a block stacking experience with two game modes. Stack as high as you can or just casually snap blocks together to build any 3D structure you want.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Network: Broadband Internet connection Additional Notes: Requires HTC VIVE
